thread.title: Man arrested in connection with Bedford bank robbery - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: Man arrested in connection with Bedford bank robbery - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: Man arrested in connection with Bedford bank robbery - Massachusetts news
text:
Bedford police have arrested a man in connection with a September bank robbery.
Patrick Gefrich, 35, of Salem, was arrested Monday morning at his home on Essex Street. He has been charged with unarmed bank robbery, according to police .
On September 18, a man approached a teller at The Brookline Bank in Bedford and demanded cash, police said. He did not show a weapon or pass a note.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Gefrich was arraigned Monday afternoon at Concord District Court. He also had warrants out of Milford District Court.
